Piwigo-desc: This is a mediawiki extension that displays a gallery of images extracted from a Piwigo setup
apihelp-piwigosearch-summary:
This API serves as a proxy to a piwigo search web service
See [https://fr.piwigo.org/doc/doku.php?id=utiliser:utilisation:fonctionnalites:recherche_rapide#syntaxe_pour_recherches_specifiques Piwogo's help] for more information
apihelp-piwigosearch-example: Search 20 images on the word clouds with the tag some tag.
